attributes.action: Send the Army in to protect the Palestinian people from oppression and murder.
attributes.additional_details: Everyone is turning a blind eye to what is happening to the people of Palestine and Gaza, yet you are happy to support the uprising of the middle east. People are being murdered on a daily basis and are treated to unfair rules which only support the Israeli illegal settlers. how is 6 months in prison justifiable for burning a family alive and 200 years for throwing a stone? please please send in the army to help Gaza and Palestine
attributes.background: It was the British Army that liberated the Jews from the mass murder by Hitler in 1949, now the people of Gaza and Palestine need saving from the Zionist Hitler. Stop supporting the mass murder and oppression of the people of Palestine and Gaza

rejection.details: We need your full name, not just your initials.
